Nero_Lite_Installer -Micro.exe Âť AUTOIT Âť script.au3 - Win32/Packed.Autoit.C.Gen potentially unwanted application
Well .My ESET NOD 32 found no virus in this file.... ?   Don't know what do believe-.......

The file is created with the autoit language. When ESET is set to detect "potential unwanted application and potential unsafe application" it will mark this as virus. ESET blocks all autoit related software.

this is Nero Lite, version 10.2

and it doesn't work on 64-bit systems
